item.title: 消息人士称，激进分子埃利奥特与英国石油公司投资者会面，讨论更多变化
item.description: 两位股东告诉路透社，激进投资者埃利奥特管理公司（Elliott Management）已经与英国石油公司的几位大股东会面，试图就这家石油巨头的更多变革达成共识，这些变革可能包括削减成本和潜在的领导层改组。【原文：Activist investor Elliott Management has met several large shareholders in BP to try to forge a consensus for more changes at the oil major that could include cost cuts and a potential leadership reshuffle, two shareholders told Reuters.】

item.title: 法国电视监管机构命令欧洲通信卫星公司停止播放两个俄罗斯频道
item.description: 法国媒体监管机构 Arcom 已下令欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）停止播放俄罗斯 STS 和 Channel 5 频道，因为调查显示该卫星供应商的商业协议与一个受制裁实体有关联。【原文：French media regulator Arcom has ordered Eutelsat to cease broadcasting Russian channels STS and Channel 5, after a probe revealed the satellite provider's commercial agreements had links to a sanctioned entity.】

item.title: 法国电视监管机构命令欧洲通信卫星公司停止播放两个俄罗斯频道
item.description: 法国媒体监管机构 Arcom 已下令欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）停止播放俄罗斯 STS 频道和第 5 频道，因为调查显示该卫星供应商的商业协议与一个受制裁实体有关联。【原文：French media regulator Arcom has ordered Eutelsat to cease broadcasting Russian channels STS and Channel 5, after a probe revealed the satellite provider's commercial agreements had links to a sanctioned entity.】

item.title: 期货因关税问题下滑；联邦快递下调预期后下跌
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货走低，市场参与者继续努力应对关税的影响，联邦快递（FedEx）是最新一家因经济不确定性而改变全年预测的公司。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Friday as market participants continued to grapple with the ramifications of tariffs, with FedEx being the latest company to alter its full-year forecasts due to economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 耐克三连跌，因预计销售额将再次下滑，快速扭亏希望渺茫
item.description: 耐克公司周五盘前股价下滑近 6%，此前这家运动服装巨头警告称，本季度销售额再次下滑，这让一些投资者担心新任首席执行官埃利奥特-希尔（Elliott Hill）的关键性扭亏步伐。【原文：Nike shares slipped nearly 6% premarket on Friday after the sportswear giant warned of another quarter of sales decline, leaving some investors worried about the pace of a crucial turnaround under new CEO Elliott Hill.】

item.title: J&J 计划未来四年在美国投资超过 550 亿美元
item.description: 强生公司（Johnson & Johnson）周五表示，公司计划在未来四年内投资超过 550 亿美元，用于在美国建设生产设施和研究基础设施。【原文：Johnson & Johnson said on Friday it plans to invest more than $55 billion over the next four years to build manufacturing facilities and research infrastructure in the United States.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻：投资者寻求股市稳定，道琼斯工业平均指数下滑成为问题所在
item.description: 即使在美股寻求重新站稳脚跟之际，密切关注的运输股指数的疲软也表明投资者对经济的担忧与日俱增。【原文：Even as U.S. stocks seek to regain their footing, weakness in a closely followed index of transportation shares is a sign of growing investor worries about the economy.】

item.title: 受关税问题和经济不确定性影响，全球股票基金本周遭遇抛售
item.description: 由于对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普激进贸易政策对全球经济潜在影响的担忧挥之不去，投资者在截至3月19日的一周内大量撤出全球股票基金。【原文：Investors pulled heavily out of global equity funds during the week through March 19 on lingering worries over the potential impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies on global economy.】

item.title: 中国称不应强迫个人进行面部识别
item.description: 中国网络空间监管机构周五公布了人脸识别技术使用管理条例，分别规定实体不得强迫个人使用人脸识别技术验证身份。【原文：China's cyberspace regulator on Friday published regulations governing the use of facial recognition technology, separately stating that entities should not force individuals to verify their identity using facial recognition technology.】

item.title: 联邦快递股价下跌，原因是年度预期下调引发对经济的担忧
item.description: 在特朗普政府对贸易伙伴全面征收关税的背景下，美国工业经济的健康状况令人担忧，联邦快递的股价在这家包裹递送公司下调2025财年业绩预期后大幅下跌。【原文：FedEx's shares fell sharply after the parcel delivery firm cut its fiscal 2025 forecasts, adding to worries about the health of the U.S. industrial economy against the backdrop of the Trump administration's sweeping tariffs on trading partners.】

item.title: 中国最大餐饮外卖公司美团网第四季度营收符合预期
item.description: 在中国消费低迷的背景下，中国最大的餐饮外卖公司美团周五公布的第四季度营收基本符合预期。【原文：China's largest food delivery firm Meituan posted on Friday a fourth-quarter revenue that was largely in line with estimates, amid sluggish Chinese consumption.】

item.title: 中国最大餐饮外卖公司美团网第四季度营收符合预期
item.description: 在中国消费低迷的背景下，中国最大的餐饮外卖公司美团周五公布的第四季度营收基本符合预期。【原文：China's largest food delivery firm Meituan posted on Friday a fourth-quarter revenue that was largely in line with estimates, amid sluggish Chinese consumption.】

item.title: 阿波罗基金将以约 10 亿美元收购英国石油管道公司 25% 的股份
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）周五表示，美国资产管理公司阿波罗全球（Apollo Global）管理的基金将以约 10 亿美元的价格收购其旗下英国石油管道公司（TANAP）25% 的非控股股权。【原文：BP on Friday said U.S.-based asset management firm Apollo Global's managed funds will buy a 25% non-controlling stake in its unit, BP Pipelines (TANAP), for about $1 billion.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，英国电信与 AT&T 和 Orange 就国外合作事宜进行接触
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，英国电信公司已与电信公司 AT&T 和 Orange 就可能的合作关系进行了接触，以帮助其国际业务扭亏为盈。【原文：Britain's BT has approached telecommunication companies AT&T and Orange over possible partnerships to help turn around its international business, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国量子计算机公司 Pasqal 与英伟达™（NVIDIA®）合作
item.description: 法国一家快速成长的量子计算机初创公司Pasqal周五宣布与芯片巨头英伟达（Nvidia）建立合作伙伴关系，Pasqal的客户将获得更多开发量子应用的工具。【原文：Pasqal, a fast-growing French quantum computer start-up company, announced on Friday a partnership with chip giant Nvidia whereby Pasqal's customers would gain access to more tools to develop quantum applications.】

item.title: 格陵兰在特朗普的关注和新机场落成后旅游业蓬勃发展
item.description: 伊维克-克努德森-奥斯特曼（Ivik Knudssen-Ostermann）的公司经营乘船游览格陵兰闪闪发光的蓝色冰山的业务，他说在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将格陵兰岛推向全球聚光灯下之后，他的银行告诉他要在预期的游客涌入之前扩大业务。【原文：Ivik Knudssen-Ostermann, whose company runs boat tours to see Greenland's glittering blue icebergs, says his bank has told him to expand ahead of an expected influx of tourists after U.S. President Donald Trump put the island in the global spotlight.】

item.title: 英国 Energean 公司终止凯雷交易
item.description: 英国天然气生产商 Energean 周五表示，由于意大利和埃及的监管审批尚未完成，公司将终止与私募股权基金凯雷就该天然气生产商部分资产达成的交易。【原文：UK-based gas producer Energean said on Friday it was terminating its deal with private equity fund Carlyle for some of the gas producer's assets due to pending regulatory approvals in Italy and Egypt.】

item.title: 印度黄金贷款提供商 Manappuram 创历史新高，贝恩资本计划收购其股份
item.description: 印度 Manappuram Finance 公司周五股价大涨 6%，此前分析师称，贝恩资本计划购买该公司 18% 的股份并共同控制这家黄金贷款提供商，这将有助于缓解其管理层继任计划。【原文：Shares of India's Manappuram Finance jumped 6% on Friday after analysts said that Bain Capital's plans to buy an 18% stake and jointly control the gold loan provider will help ease its management succession plans.】

item.title: 周五飞抵希思罗机场的航空公司
item.description: 英国希思罗机场周五表示，由于附近一个变电站发生大火，导致电力中断，全球航空公司的航班时刻表被打乱，该机场将继续关闭一天。【原文：Britain's Heathrow Airport said on Friday it will remain closed through the day after a huge fire at a nearby electrical substation wiped out power, disrupting flight schedules of global airlines.】

item.title: 对冲基金占主导地位是发烧的英国债市面临的最新风险
item.description: 投资者和对冲基金消息人士称，对冲基金纷纷涌入以债务为动力的英国政府债券押注，增加了金边债券市场不稳定的可能性，而金边债券是英国包括抵押贷款在内的借贷成本的基准。【原文：Hedge funds have crowded into debt-fuelled bets on UK government bonds, increasing the potential for instability in the gilts market, a benchmark for borrowing costs in Britain including mortgages, investors and hedge fund sources say.】

item.title: 欧盟削减繁文缛节让大企业欲罢不能
item.description: 奥地利制造商 RHI Magnesita 每年要从约 4 亿欧元的收入中拿出约 100 万欧元来确保自己符合欧盟关于企业可持续发展的规定。该公司表示，第一波旨在废除层层繁文缛节的改革措施对减少这一开支几乎毫无帮助。【原文：Austrian manufacturer RHI Magnesita spends about 1 million euros of its roughly 400 million euros earnings a year ensuring it complies with EU rules on corporate sustainability. A first wave of reforms to peel back layers of red tape will do little to cut that bill, it says.】

item.title: 阿达尼捍卫印度主要项目免受环境挑战
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的集团本月在法庭上被指控其计划中的数十亿美元发电厂和豪华住宅区违反了环境法，这使其在法律上更加头疼。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's group is battling allegations in court this month that its planned multibillion-dollar power plant and a luxury housing complex breach environment laws, adding to its many legal headaches.】

item.title: 北京助力人工智能初创企业 Manus，中国正在寻找下一个 DeepSeek
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司马努斯（Manus）周二注册了面向中国的人工智能助手，并首次出现在国家媒体的广播节目中，这凸显了中国政府扶持获得海外认可的国内人工智能公司的战略。【原文：Chinese artificial intelligence startup Manus on Tuesday registered its China-facing AI assistant and was featured for the first time in a state media broadcast, highlighting Beijing's strategy of boosting domestic AI firms that have received overseas recognition.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：美国寻求重启乌克兰矿产交易条款
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引两名乌克兰官员的话报道称，特朗普政府正在寻求美国获得乌克兰关键矿产和能源资产的新条件，在推动与俄罗斯达成和平协议的同时扩大对基辅的经济要求。【原文：The Trump administration is seeking new terms for U.S. access to critical minerals and energy assets in Ukraine, widening its economic demands on Kyiv as it pushes for a peace deal with Russia, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing two Ukrainian officials.】

item.title: 美国陆军要求安杜里尔公司提供新型小型固体火箭发动机
item.description: 安杜里尔工业公司（Anduril Industries）周五表示，美国陆军已选定该公司开发用于执行远程精确火箭炮任务的新型 4.75 英寸固体火箭发动机。【原文：Anduril Industries has been selected by the U.S. Army to develop a new 4.75-inch solid rocket motor for long-range precision rocket artillery missions, the company said on Friday.】

item.title: 马来西亚航空公司母公司将购买 30 架波音 737 喷气机
item.description: 马来西亚航空公司的母公司马来西亚航空集团周五表示，将购买 30 架新的波音 737 飞机，于 2030 年交付。【原文：Malaysia Aviation Group, the parent company of Malaysia Airlines, said on Friday it will purchase 30 new Boeing 737 aircraft for 2030 delivery.】

item.title: 独家：印度 230 亿美元计划与中国工厂竞争，但结果令人失望，该计划将失效
item.description: 据四位政府官员透露，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）领导的政府已决定终止一项价值 230 亿美元的国内制造业激励计划，而这距离印度政府为从中国吸引企业而推出该计划仅过去了四年。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's government has decided to let lapse a $23 billion program to incentivize domestic manufacturing, just four years after it launched the effort to woo firms away from China, according to four government officials.】

item.title: 聚焦：关闭工厂：中国铜冶炼厂应对利润崩溃
item.description: 业内人士称，3 月份是传统的需求高峰期，中国的主要铜冶炼厂已开始进行设备维护，以遏制因原料短缺加剧而造成的损失。【原文：Major copper smelters across top consumer China have kicked off equipment maintenance in March, traditionally a peak demand period, in a bid to stem losses from a worsening feedstock shortage that is hammering margins, industry insiders said.】
